duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and submit proposals to develop business in collaboration with Directors, Managers, Sales, and marketing personnel.
Define project scope with clients and utilize project management tools to construct actionable plans for project completion.
Plan and manage resources, deadlines, and internal processes throughout project lifecycles, and gather and relay critical project information to relevant parties.
Manage and track the financial performance of all projects and report financial performance to relevant internal parties.
Support the work of internal production teams and subcontractors throughout projects by providing clear expectations and performance feedback.
Develop positive working relationships with internal and external clients throughout projects to ensure expectations are met.
Perform related responsibilities as required or assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree in Project Management, Construction Management, or related field. PMP Certification preferred.
